address: 29 rue du Chemin Vert, 78610 Le Perray-en-Yvelines, France
notes: Part of Croda International, pioneer in cosmetic peptide technology. Famous for Matrixyl® 3000 (stimulates collagen and elastin synthesis), Matrixyl® synthe'6® (smoothes wrinkles), Easyliance™ (natural instant lift), and Relistase™ (fights sagging, firms and lifts). Extensive R&D with clinical validation. Premium positioning with patented technologies. Strong technical documentation and formulation support.
